name: Jupiter Jazz
tag_list: visual-art, visual-effects, generative-art, algorithmic-art, rendering, computer-graphics, industrial-design, furniture-design, interior-design, product-engineering, human-computer-interfaces, software-development, 3d-graphics
overview:
Jupiter Jazz Limited is an entity that backs the Jupiter Jazz Group (‘the group’).

The group is a tribe (network) of around 50 professionals from various visual art and design related disciplines, operating from around the world. Teams are assembled based on project needs and members are relocated for the duration of a project, if needed. The projects span a wide range. From generative art installations over blockbuster visual effects production to product design, product engineering and software development.

Jupiter Jazz makes and sells several visual effects and motion graphics related software products. The group operates at the intersection of products and services. As such software development is also offered as a service. Custom software is commonly released as open source (contingent allowance from the client) and then tailored for the needs of other clients, later, to generate additional revenue.
